complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Project Repository and Core Structure
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the setup of the Next.js project into subtasks like initializing the repository, configuring TypeScript, installing dependencies, setting up folder structures, and configuring ESLint/Prettier.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is foundational and involves setting up multiple project configurations and structures, but it follows well-documented best practices and tools.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Basic Video Player and Scroll Detection
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into creating the VideoPlayer component, developing the useScrollVideo hook, setting up Intersection Observer, implementing video preloading, and designing error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task is complex due to custom hook development, integration of advanced APIs, and performance considerations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Landing Page with Initial Video Transitions
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Subdivide into designing the hero section, implementing scroll-triggered transitions, setting up responsive behavior for different devices, optimizing video loading, and adding placeholder content.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Combining design, responsiveness, and performance optimization makes this a moderately complex task.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into designing the grid layout, implementing thumbnail components, adding click-to-expand functionality, and creating filtering mechanisms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task involves straightforward UI and interaction logic but requires careful attention to responsiveness and performance.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Services Section with Video Examples
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into creating service card components, implementing hover/click animations, setting up autoplay/pause behavior, and ensuring responsiveness.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is moderately complex due to the interactivity and dynamic video handling requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Basic Contact Form and Inquiry System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into designing the UI, implementing validation, setting up serverless submission handling, integrating a database, and configuring spam protection.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task is complex due to integration of serverless functions, database interactions, and security measures.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into implementing canvas-based blending, adding configurable effects, optimizing rendering, setting up quality switching, and documenting APIs.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task is highly complex due to advanced graphical effects, performance optimization, and API design.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Headless CMS for Content Management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into selecting a CMS, designing content models, implementing API integration, and setting up caching and optimization pipelines.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task involves multiple integration steps but follows established patterns for headless CMS use.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into setting up traffic and event tracking, integrating performance monitoring tools, implementing error tracking, and creating a custom dashboard.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task has low technical complexity but requires careful setup of various tools and compliance considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into performing performance audits, setting up lazy loading and caching, configuring SEO, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and conducting security audits.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task is complex due to its comprehensive scope, requiring optimizations and configurations across multiple aspects of the project.
